title: Belief | Christ | Suffering: A Commentary on Jordan Peterson and Jonathan Pageau
description: This is a conversation with Luke, Jess, Nate, Michael, and Sam as a commentary on Jonathan Pageau's appearance on Jordan Peterson's podcast.
